articles.title: Young people are experiencing rare cases of heart inflammation after getting coronavirus vaccines - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Doctors said that the risk of getting myocarditis from COVID-19 is far greater than the chance of getting it from the vaccine.
articles.content:
Young people who received the Pfizer-BioNTech or Moderna coronavirus vaccines have reported higher-than-usual rates of heart inflammation and swelling, US health officials said on Thursday.

articles.title: Humans can reproduce on Mars because sperm can survive there for up to 200 years, a new study suggests - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: A study suggests sperm can survive on Mars for 200 years. The findings "are essential for mankind to progress into the space age," said its co-author.
articles.content:
Human reproduction will be possible on Mars because sperm can survive there for up to 200 years, a study suggests.
